definition: located away from the midline of a vessel or aircraft, internal-combustion engine that mounts at stern of small boat
details:
adjective
- located away from the midline of a vessel or aircraft
= example: located away from the midline of a vessel or aircraft
noun
- internal-combustion engine that mounts at stern of small boat
= synonyms: outboard motor
- a motorboat with an outboard motor
= synonyms: outboard motorboat
